Pre-Game Insights: The New York Mets and Chicago White Sox will send Sean Manaea and Garrett Crochet to the mound, respectively.
The Mets have a team ERA of 4.10, ranking 15th in the league, while the White Sox have an ERA of 4.88, ranking 29th.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game will be played at Guaranteed Rate Field in Chicago, Illinois, at 2:10 p.m. ET.
The game can be viewed on NBC Sports Networks and streamed live on Fubo.
Others: Betting odds for the game favor the Mets (-171) and the White Sox (+143), with an over/under of 8 runs expected.
